name: artifactstagger
description: Tag Azure DevOps build artifacts from a release or YAML pipeline
helpMarkDown: For aditional information and support please refer to <https://github.com/dmitryserbin/azdev-artifacts-tagger> project repository.
author: Dmitry Serbin

inputs.name: EndpointType
inputs.label: Azure DevOps endpoint type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select endpoint type to connect Azure DevOps: 
Integrated = default `SystemVssConnection` service endpoint for `Project Collection Build Service` user account; 
Service = user-defined personal access token (PAT) service endpoint 

Note: requires `View builds`, `View build definition` and `Update build information` build pipeline permissions

inputs.name: ConnectedService
inputs.label: Service endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select service endpoint for Azure DevOps account

inputs.name: StageNameTag
inputs.label: Add stage name tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag all build artifacts with current stage name (use `Release.EnvironmentName` (classic) or `System.StageName` (YAML) pipeline variable)

inputs.name: ReleaseNameTag
inputs.label: Add release name tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag all build artifacts with current release name (use `Release.ReleaseName` (classic) or `Build.BuildNumber` (YAML) variable)

inputs.name: CustomTags
inputs.label: Specify custom tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag all build artifacts (release) or current run (YAML) with specified tags (new line separated)

inputs.name: RemoveDuplicates
inputs.label: Remove duplicates
inputs.helpMarkDown: Remove duplicated tags from all build artifact definition builds
